summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2610 for the improvement of Wheeler Street from Queen Anne Boulevard to the westerly margin of Tract No. 2 as platted in Hunter's Lake Union Addition, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, by constructing concrete sidewalks and concrete retaining walls where necessary, by providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 30485, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
